refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the auto generated id used in the last query

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The mysqli_insert_id returns the ID generated by a query on a table with an column having the AUTO_INCREMENT attribute. If the last query wasn't an INSERT or UPDATE statement or if the modified table does not have a column with the AUTO_INCREMENT attribute this function will return zero.

note.para: Performing an INSERT or UPDATE statement using the LAST_INSERT_ID() function will also modify the value returned by the mysqli_insert_id function.
